irauenzahn053.shapes

Class AreaShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • irauenzahn053.shapes.Shape
      • irauenzahn053.shapes.AreaShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Rectangle

    public abstract class AreaShape
extends Shape
    Represents any shape with an area
    Version:
    10/17/18
    Author:
    irauenzahn053
